participant_1.background:
I don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
I love winning.
Coffee is important to me.
I can tell right away if i m going to like someone.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in syracuse , ny with my parents and brother.
I d also like to study abroad in spain.
I am currently studying at union college and want to be an english teacher.
That way , after graduating , i can teach english there for a year or two.
I am a huge buffalo bills fan , and our family has season tickets.

content.text: I'm a New Yorker who loves coffee and winning!  Where are you from?
I'm from Syracuse, NY! I'm a huge Buffalo Bills fan, and my family has season tickets.
Oh cool! I'm not a football fan, but I love to travel. Do you have any plans to study abroad?
I'd love to study abroad in Spain after I graduate! I'm currently studying at Union College, and I want to be an English teacher.
That's awesome! I'm an English teacher too! What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go out to eat, and spend time with my family and friends.
Me too! We should get together sometime and have coffee.
That sounds like a great idea! Let me know when you're free.
I'm free next weekend. What do you think about getting coffee on Saturday morning?
That sounds perfect! I'll see you then!
